meanings.definition: A small, ornamental button for fastening a shirt cuff.
meanings.sent1: I lost a stud from my shirt cuff.
meanings.sent2: She sewed a shiny stud onto the cuff of her shirt.
meanings.sent3: The stud on my cuff decided to take a walk and disappeared.
meanings.sent4: The stud on the cuff sparkled like a tiny star.
meanings.sent5: The stud on the cuff added a touch of elegance to the shirt.

meanings.definition: A small, upright post in a wall for supporting a structure.
meanings.sent1: The wall had a sturdy stud holding it up.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter hammered the stud into the wall to support the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The stud in the wall felt proud to be so reliable.
meanings.sent4: The stud in the wall stood tall like a soldier on duty.
meanings.sent5: The stud in the wall bore the weight of the structure with ease.

meanings.definition: A young man thought to be very active sexually or attractive.
meanings.sent1: He was known as a real stud among his friends.
meanings.sent2: The girls whispered about the new stud in town.
meanings.sent3: The stud at the party had all the ladies swooning.
meanings.sent4: He strutted around like a proud peacock, aware of his stud status.
meanings.sent5: The stud's charm and confidence made him stand out in the crowd.
